name: Web X.0 Media
overview:
Web X.0 Media researches, designs and develops simple, social applications that help individuals and organizations connect and collaborate using next-generation Internet technologies.

Our most recent venture is called KnowPro. All KnowPro Apps are quiz-based, inviting users to test their knowledge, learn a new topic, prepare for an exam or just have fun playing â€“ anywhere, anytime. With topics soon ranging from healthcare and parenting issues, to travel and technology, to hobbies and pop culture, weâ€™ll be able to say, Thereâ€™s a KnowPro App for that. http://knowproapps.com
